venue.address_1: 212 Northern Avenue, East Building I, Suite 300
venue.name: MOITI (Boston Fish Pier)

item.description:
https://www.alumni.mcgill.ca/aoc/events-travel/EventDetails.php?id=MTUxMzM%3D
CNN, FOX, MSNBC, ABC, NBC, CBS. Tired of watching the same old cable news and network channels for insight into the presidential campaign? Tired of hearing the same old talking heads give us their take? Let's meet up on October 23rd for a fresh perspective on the campaign. Professor Gil Troy, U.S. Presidential Historian at McGill, will give his take on the upcoming election in his talk, "Some things never change - The 2012 Presidential campaign in historical perspective."
This event is not be missed. Click on the link above to sign up. I'll be at the registration desk, welcoming you to the event!

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Somethings never change - Gil Troy lecture
